main.name: Dominic Evans
main.bio: Caribbean based software developer with a passion for building clean, efficent and maintainable software
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Rebuilt and updated web pages to use responsive modern designs, Improved UI and UX across university websites, Trained university staff in Kentico CMS.

work.title: QA Engineer
work.description: Implemented automated testing with Selenium, Appium and Chakram, Manual tested mobile and web apps.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Implemented features and maintain, mMoney React and React-native Apps, Developed ECCB iOS native Apps, Created and maintained unit tests

work.title: Lead Software Engineer
work.description: Design full scale application architectures for clients in various countries, Develop and deploy software solutions, Work closely with clients to test and continually maintain their software.

testimonials.text:
Dominic Started at Bitt in the QA department and proved to be detailed and determined to understand the solutions. Because of his hard work he was moved onto a product team as a software engineer where he immediately proved his value by quickly contributing to a multi phase feature. 
Dominic has the grit to dig into a problem while constantly communicating with his team. He understands the value of feedback both personally for himself and for the work itself. He is very personable and professional. I was lucky to have Dominic on our team at Bitt.
